title: Lethal Marriage: The Unspeakable Crimes of Paul Bernardo and Karla Homolka
description: Until their capture in 1993, Karla Homolka and Paul Bernardo preyed on schoolgirls and videotaped their sexual assaults and sadistic killings in grisly detail. Now, the crime reporter dedicated to their story presents the comprehensive account of the spree, the manhunt, and the trial that horrified and mesmerized the public. Includes eight pages of photos. Original.
author: Nick Pron
